title: Windows Essential XP SP3 Update includes all SATA Drivers
description:
I Did not create this I just put it in one RAR instead of 5 



Windows Essential XP SP3 Update includes all SATA Drivers!


This is a slimmed down version of XP to the bare essentials but still remains fully functional. Over 300mb of crap removed from a real genuine XP ISO and added some important software (see below) to make a very complete OS.

At no point will you need to enter a serial during installation. The original ISO is from an ETH0 Student Edition release so there is no need to worry about WGA. This has been tested on VirtualBox/ VMWare numerous times without errors. All your applications, games and everything will work just fine.

UXTheme.dll has been patched to allow 3rd party themes. USB mouse polling rate increased to 500Hz for smoother mouse movement while gaming. Pointer precision enhancement disabled (all gamers rejoice!). Max TCP half-open connections raised to 100.

No languages have been removed.

As of May 25, 2008 - Drivers for the most popular SATA/ RAID Controllers have been added as part of the install. No more need to Press F6 to load drivers.

* Windows Media Player 11 Including all updates
Latest media player from Microsoft

* Internet Explorer 7 Including all updates
Latest stable release

* Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1, 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 including all updates
Needed for many latest apps to run

* Sun Java Runtime Environment 6 Update 6
Needed for Java based apps

* Unlocker 1.8.7
Gives write access to files in use

* Adobe Reader Lite 8.1.2
Bloatless version of the best PDF reader

* Combined Community Codec Pack 17/5/2008
Very lightweight codec pack that will let you play back almost anything you come across

* CoreAVC Professional 1.7.0.0
The Best H264 Decoder available

* KMPlayer 2.9.3.1431
The best all in one media player with a plethora of features

* Windows Live Messenger 8.5
Pre-patched to allow polygamy, remove ads and etc. Includes Live Safety Scanner

* Windows Live Mail
Microsoft replacement for Outlook Express

* Zune theme
Theme from Microsoft. XP will default to this theme after install

* TweakUI in Control Panel
User interface customization app

* Raxco PerfectDisk 2008 Professional
Award winning defrag software for Windows

* CCleaner
A very safe and reliable registry cleaner

* Hashtab Shell Extension
A shell extension for viewing file hashes. A must have for every uploader!

* Gabest AVI Splitter
Replacement for the built in lackluster Windows AVI Splitter. Now you can play back broken AVI files even in WMP!

* UPDATED! WinRAR 3.80 Beta 1
Most popular archiver

* UPDATED! Your Uninstaller! 2008 Professional 6.1.1250
Leave nothing behind of your unwanted software

* NEW! Nero Micro 8.3.2.1
Due to popular demand! Nero Micro is a slimmed down version of the Nero Suite that contains only Nero Express and Nero Burning ROM

* Lots of registry modifications to help improve performance

* Contains all Windows Updates till the date of release
